# strides

**Instance Property**

A number array in which each element is the number of memory locations that span the length of the corresponding dimension.

## Declaration

```swift
var strides: [NSNumber] { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray/subscript(_:)-2hh91] and [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray/subscript(_:)-3d9el] for code examples that use `strides`.

## Inspecting a multiarray

- **count**: The total number of elements in the multiarray.
- **dataType**: The underlying type of the multiarray.
- **shape**: The multiarray’s multidimensional shape as a number array in which each element’s value is the size of the corresponding dimension.
